snippet: After an assault, four high school students, two with mental disabilities, become linked by universal emotions and challenges.
abstract: Priscilla Gilman reviews book A Step Toward Falling by Cammie McGovern.
lead_paragraph: After an assault, four high school students, two with mental disabilities, become linked by universal emotions and challenges.

headline.main: ‘A Step Toward Falling,’ by Cammie McGovern
